transcript.title: TRANSCRIPT OF THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P.J.KEATING MP DOORSTOP, MANUKA OVAL, WEDNESDAY, 9 NOVEMBER 1994
transcript.content:
PRIME MINISTER
TRANSCRIPT OF THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P. J. KEATING MP
DOORSTOP, MANUKA OVAL, WEDNESDAY, 9 NOVEMBER 1994
E& OE PROOF COPY
J: Prime Minister, who would you like to see as your opponent at the next
election Mr Howard or Mr Downer?
PM: I see Mr Howard is out there on the air waves today, as I said, once
there is any whiff of mortality around, he starts hearing voices,
becomes a visionary again. But, as you know, Mr Howard's vision is a
vision of the 1950s. So, if you want to really tune into his thoughts you
need a big trip down the time tunnel.
ends
r I
